QuestData.Title: Junk in My Trunk
QuestData.Description: Just look at it! Me trunk never been so empty.$b$bMe mates jumped at the sight o' all that booty, and now look at 'em! Rattlin' bones, they be!$b$bSay, thar be plenty o' loot farther in, an' not the cursed kind I'll wager.$b$bFetch it fer me an' I'll be rewardin' ya handsomely, matey.
QuestData.LogDescription: Brigg in Utgarde Pinnacle wants you to find 5 Untarnished Silver Bars, 3 Shiny Baubles, 2 Golden Goblets, and a Jade Statue.
QuestData.CompletionText: How'd yeh fare in thar, matey?
QuestData.RewardText: Brilliant! Ye've gone and done it, matey.$b$bNow I can show me face to the Cap'n without fearin' fer me life, thanks be ta you and yer mates.$b$bHere's a little booty fer you in return.
